data.name: Berkeys Plumbing, A/C & Electrical
data.address: 3001 W 5th St Suite 700, Fort Worth, TX 76107

reviews.text: Berkeys Plumbing, A/C & Electrical 3001 W 5th St Suite 700, Fort Worth, TX 76107 We're grateful for 50 years serving amazing Fort Worth families! Thank you for trusting us with your homes. Happy Thanksgiving from all of us at Berkeys! Customer service available 24/7 #Thanksgiving
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Pricing was reasonable and I am a happy customer with the service." "Service tech Clayton did an awesome job fixing our plumbing problem." "The guys replaced our ac unit quickly and efficiently and at a decent price."

Problem with a/c coming on. I called Berkeys around 3:39 on a Fri evening and got an appt for the next day. The office called me around 1 p. m. Sat to tell me tech would be here in 30 min. Christian was right on time and did a great job … More Response from the owner a week ago We're grateful for your positive feedback and are thrilled to hear about your experience with our technician, Christian. Thank you for recommending Berkeys Plumbing, A/C & Electrical!

Paid $855 to replace 2 T&P valves and 2 plastic unions. No other work done. The parts used cost under $60 retail (I looked it up), and the install was done in an hour. So we are talking $800 an hour for labor whereas the average is $105 hr. … More Response from the owner 3 months ago
